dialogue: We have a GPS location of {20}..
Where was he hiding?
In a small farm near the South Coast..
You've got to be joking!
Of course I'm joking! He is in a high-security underground bunker in Middlesbrough..
And I thought my jokes were bad..
We will send in our best agents for this mission..
I'll start rounding them up!
This is one of the most crucial missions we have ever done. We need to bring {20} back here for questioning, so we can figure out what is really going on here, and the reason behind these attacks..
*the sound of sirens start blaring again*
Hmm, thats very strange..
What is it?
Well, the system is saying that the intended target is the underground bunker in Middlesbrough. The missile seems to be of the digging variety..
What? Why would they be attacking their own base?
My guess is that the secrets that {20} hold are so valuable, he is willing to die to make sure that the information he has does not get leaked...
Surely you are not implying that we actually have to protect this bunker from the missle, and capture {20} at the same time?
I think that is exactly what the Director is suggesting...
I don't think we are winning this one...
Just gets the walls ready, would you..
On it Boss...
